content:
IOperationDataStream IOperationDataStream Interface

In this Article

Edit

An IOperationDataStream encapsulates a stream of OperationData objects that are exchanged between Primary replica and Secondary replica. Objects that implement IOperationDataStream are used during the copy process. Both the copy context GetCopyContext() method that is sent from the Secondary replica to the Primary replica and the copy state GetCopyState(Int64, IOperationDataStream) method implement the IOperationDataStream interface.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IOperationDataStreamPublic Interface IOperationDataStream

Methods summary

GetNextAsync(CancellationToken)
GetNextAsync(CancellationToken)

Gets the next OperationData object from the IOperationDataStream.

Methods

  • Edit
    GetNextAsync(CancellationToken)
    GetNextAsync(CancellationToken)

    Gets the next OperationData object from the IOperationDataStream.

    Task<OperationData> GetNextAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)Function GetNextAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of OperationData)

    Parameters

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      Provides a mechanism to cancel the asynchronous operation.

    Returns

    • Task<OperationData>
      Task(Of OperationData)

      Returns Task<TResult> of type OperationData.

    Remarks

    Returning null indicates to the system that the transfer is complete.

Details

Namespace

System.Fabric

Assembly

System.Fabric.dll
